department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 這堂研究導向的課程主要在使修課學生能夠有機會在適當的指導下獨立完成音樂與情緒相關研究。目標在於訓練同學建立研究、分析、及獨立思考的能力，並透過心理物理學、撰寫聽覺實驗相關程式、及執行聽覺行為實驗獲得實際經驗。同學將探討目前在音樂與情緒的相關文獻，並且學習做有系統的整理和歸納。在此課程中，同學會實際操作隔音室聽覺實驗相關器材來進行音樂與情緒相關實驗，並將所蒐集的情緒音樂資料做分析，藉已探討音樂與情緒認知相關的議題。
goal.en:
This research-oriented course is designed to introduce students to topics in music 
and emotion and to conduct a related behavioral and/or neuroimaging experiment 
under supervision. The goal is to train students for future research in areas related
to the dynamic interactions between music and emotion.The course will utilize auditory perceptual tasks, psychophysical procedures, auditory stimuli design and programming and conducting auditory cognitive experiments to gain actual experiences in conducting auditory research. Students will present current literature related to 
topics on music and emotion, as well as design experiments and analyze data in
this area.

outline.ch: 音樂認知理論、情緒理論、生理訊號與情緒、音樂認知實驗操作方法、聲音訊號實驗程式撰寫、隔音室聽覺實驗相關器材操作
outline.en:
“music features and theory, emotion theory, physiological measures and emotion, music cognition experiment design, programming auditory signals, equipment protocol in auditory chamber, recording experiment use, data analysis,
Module 1. Relationship between human affect and music
Module 2: Fundamental acoustics within music that influences emotion
Module 3: Comparison between auditory and visual induced emotions
Module 4. Memory of music-induced emotions
Module 5: Application of music-induced emotion to music therapy or aesthetics/movie industry

“Handbook of Music and Emotion: Theory, Research, Applications
